long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Swip displays the coupons found for the merchant you are visiting, and allows you to test all known coupons during the final purchase phase. 

Swip also allows you to bookmark favorite products in your wishlist, and have suggestions for similar products from certain merchants.
